### About me

I am a post-doctoral researcher at the University of California, Berkeley, and affiliated with the Center for Effective Global Action (CEGA).

I hold a Ph.D. in Economics from Tilburg University where I am affiliated with the Experimental Economists at Tilburg. 

A recent version of my CV is available [here]("files/JRUE CV August19.pdf").

Behavioural Economics

**Secondary Interests**

Social and Cognitive Psychology
